welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Tustin! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, diverse culinary scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that North Tustin has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights, providing a more luxurious and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the WiFi network for free by connecting to the designated network and entering the provided password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Compton Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
